pages.text: The scabbard is very similar to the quiver in both form and function. It is used to store a single sword of your choice. What makes it particularly useful, however, is that it makes said sword much easier to access. By simply pressing a key (by default "r") you can immediately swap out your current item with a sword. This is particularly useful if you need the hot-bar space, or if you just want to look and sound cool as heck.
